title: Real-time image analysis
content: The software offers real-time image classification and analysis, eliminating delays commonly experienced with cloud-based solutions.

title: Data privacy and security
content: With edge computing capabilities, businesses can assure customers that their images are processed locally and aren't uploaded or stored in the cloud, thereby addressing data privacy concerns.

title: Cost-effective solution
content: Businesses can reduce infrastructure expenses tied to maintaining large cloud-based processing servers.

title: Scalability
content: Since the computational load is distributed and not centralized, businesses can easily scale the solution to more users without significant backend enhancements.
